item.title: Luigi Mangione fights extradition to face charge of murdering CEO
item.description: The 26-year-old was arrested in Pennsylvania, and prosecutors are seeking to bring him to trial in New York.

item.title: 'I want justice': Victims of Syria chemical attacks speak freely for first time
item.description: The UN's chemical watchdog says dozens were killed in a chemical attack in Eastern Ghouta in 2018.

item.title: The 50 men accused in mass rape of Gisèle Pelicot
item.description: The men accused of raping Gisèle Pelicot have been dubbed Monsieur-Tout-Le-Monde as they broadly represent a microcosm of French society.

item.title: The Onion's purchase of Alex Jones's Infowars rejected by judge
item.description: Judge Christopher Lopez ruled that an auction for Infowars did not result in the best bids possible.

item.title: Lawyer cites 300 potential cases against Diddy
item.description: US lawyer Tony Buzbee says he still receives daily calls with new allegations about the music mogul.
